channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grafiti - “Weed for days” etched into the yellow line on Hallam Close, 1st August
item.description:
The yellow line on the road (left side as you walk up Hallam Close from Downs Avenue) has grafiti etched into the yellow line which says “weed for days” What three words: ///task.form.caring ///cuts.foam.energetic ///robe.indoor.quiet Please look along the yellow line on the left as you enter Hallam close to see the graffiti.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hallam Close, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
